title: Perfect Chance
description: She’s lived by everyone else’s rules. Now it’s time to take a chance on herself. Maybe the cute cowboy from the bar, too.Carly Walsh has played the part of perfect high society daughter all her life, but it’s long past time she was true to herself before anyone else.Kaden McMurray is tired of living in the shadow of his older brother’s success. And when the determined blonde at the bar sets her sights on him and only him, there’s no way he’s turning her down.She wants one night to live on the wild side. Who is he to deny her?But that one reckless indiscretion gives them a whole lot more than they bargained for.It’s too bad they never exchanged names.
author: Molly McLain
